description: Title of section where a list can be selected as the content of the feed
Helper text for the feed content section when the feed is sharing only fact-checks.
defaultMessage: Select a custom filtered list of published fact-checks from your workspace to contribute to this shared feed. You will be able to update this list at any time.

description: Helper text for the feed content section when the feed is sharing only media.
defaultMessage: Select a custom filtered list of media, claims & requests from your workspace to contribute to this shared feed. You will be able to update this list at any time.

description: Helper text for the feed content section when the feed is sharing fact-checks and media.
defaultMessage: Select a custom filtered list of published fact-checks or media, claims & requests from your workspace to contribute to this shared feed. You will be able to update this list at any time.

description: Helper text for the feed content list select drop-down.
